name: Mixmoov
overview:
Mixmoov specializes in Cloud Video Editing. It provides a white labelled, customizable, online video editing solution. Different modules can be put together to build products and services for creating and editing rich media content. Media including videos, audio and images can be imported from third party platforms, CMS, and other sources including websites, desktop and mobile. These media can be used to create and edit videos in the intuitive video editor interface.

A text editor, effects, transitions and template-based video creation are also part of the video editor. A special feature for treating videos is the frame-accurate cut. Once the video is ready, it can be published in up to 1080p HD quality in multiple formats to third party platforms, CMS, websites/blogs, mobile, or downloaded. Mixmoov is available in multiple languages, and APIs are provided for integrating it to websites and product platforms. Mixmoov can be easily integrated to existing workflows as a cloud-based or on-premise solution.

Mixmoov SAS is among the 100 companies that matter most in Online Video (Streaming Media inaugural list 2011). Mixmoov counts the leading OVPs like Brightcove, Kaltura, LongTail Video, Twistage and thePlatform among its partners.

relationships.title: Investor and non Executive Board Member
